INFORMATION.text1: in partnership with Saman' Car Insurance
INFORMATION.text3: We connect people around the world with their ideal rental car in Iran during their trip. At Sepris.com, you can search for all kinds of rental cars in Iran, compare prices, detailed information on additional facilities, and book the best option that fits your needs.
INFORMATION.text4: چرا در سِپریس ماشین اجاره دهیم؟
INFORMATION.text6: اطلاعات ماشین‌تان را در سپریس ثبت کنید و منتظر بمانید! با سپریس می‌توانید از اجاره ماشین‌تان درآمد روزانه داشته باشید. فقط کافی‌ست اطلاعات خودرو را درست و دقیق وارد کنید و تصاویر خوب و باکیفیت برای ماشین‌تان انتخاب کنید.
INFORMATION.text8: رایگان و با شرایط مورد نظر خود، ماشین‌تان را در سپریس ثبت کنید. اجاره خودرو به تعداد روزهای تعیین شده از سمت شما، در تاریخ‌های مدنظر شما، قیمت انتخابی شما و با بررسی کامل شخص مهمان از طرف شما انجام خواهد شد.
INFORMATION.text10: با خیال راحت کسب درآمد کنید. بیمه اجاره خودرو بابت خسارت‌های احتمالی به شما اطمینان خاطر خواهد داد.
INFORMATION.text13: We make sure you drive a car with peace of mind. We provide you with insurance that pays for everything in case of any damage or accident.
INFORMATION.text15: We have provided an exceptional list of options for you to choose among. The rental cars available at Sepris are great in diversity as for prices, car types, options, features, brands, etc.
INFORMATION.text17: We assure you get the help you may need at the right time. Our customer support team at Sepris is available 24/7 for any possible question, problem, or urgency.
INFORMATION.text18: Why Rent a Car in Iran?
INFORMATION.text19: No matter how long our trip is, it always seems short and we want to make the most out of the days. Renting a car in Iran would provide you with perfect opportunities and possibilities you wouldn’t otherwise imagine having. For that matter; a rental car in Iran gives you the freedom to explore the cities on your own and have a tour to places out of the common tourist traps and crowded cities.
INFORMATION.text20: Moreover, you can rent a car in Tehran to get yourself out of the cost, delay, and hassle of public transport and online taxis. With taxis, you need to spend time requesting, calling, and organizing without having control over your schedule, changing your plan anytime, pulling over anywhere on the road to rest, to see the view, or for the toilet break, driving at the desired speed, etc. Having a rental car in Iran means you can have your own schedule regardless of the public transport and tour buses’ timetables. It may seem public transport is cheaper than car rental, but considering the convenience, the comfort, and the additional time you get, renting a car is incredibly cheap and cost-effective.
INFORMATION.text21: Furthermore, having a taxi from the airport to the city usually costs a lot, having a rental from the onset of your trip helps you save money and time right from the start. We recommend renting a car in Tehran especially if you are traveling with family or in a group; that would be extremely cheaper than any other way of transportation.
INFORMATION.text22: علاوه بر موارد اشاره شده، اجاره ماشین مزایای زیر را در بردارد:
INFORMATION.text23: Also, not all trips are the same; you might travel for work or leisure, you might travel alone, with colleagues or family, you might be having a long road trip or just a small city tour. By using rental cars, you can pick the one that best fits your needs regarding comfort, space, gas consumption, etc. You can also choose to rent chauffeur-driven cars or self-drives. With chauffeur-driven rental cars, you will also have the benefit of a local guide’s companionship.
INFORMATION.text24: Renting a car in Iran would bring you an extreme amount of comfort and convenience by having easy access to your stuff, making a great deal of space to stretch out, having control over the air conditioner, car windows, radio or player, etc. You will also have the privacy and peace that public transports would never offer you.
INFORMATION.text25: حتی اگر دارای ماشین شخصی هستید، می‌توانید با یک انتخاب هوشمندانه ماشین مناسبی برای سفر خود اجاره کنید. به این ترتیب، علاوه بر آنکه از استهلاک خودروی خود جلوگیری می‌کنید، می‌توانید ماشینی را انتخاب کنید که به نسبت ماشین خود دارای مصرف سوخت بهینه‌تر یا به عبارتی کمتر است و یا فضای بیشتری برای سرنشینان و چمدانها دارد.
INFORMATION.text26: اجاره ماشین درون شهر به شما این امکان را می‌دهد که بدون نگرانی از نبود تاکسی و یا دیر رسیدن به ایستگاه مورد نظر، یک روز عالی کاری را فارغ از صف‌های طولانی اتوبوس و تاکسی و یا انتظار برای قبول درخواست شما از سوی سامانه‌های آنلاین رزرو تاکسی را داشته باشید.
INFORMATION.text27: فارغ از بودجه‌ای که برای مراسم عروسی خود در نظر گرفته‌اید، شما می‌توانید ماشین ایده‌آل خود را برای یک شب رویارویی اجاره کنید. فراموش نکنید که تنها قرار است هزینه رنت ماشین را پرداخت کنید و نه هزینه خرید آن را.
INFORMATION.text28: هر یک از موارد فوق می‌تواند دلیل خوبی برای اجاره ماشین باشد، که اجاره ماشین از سامانه سپریس به شما این اطمینان را می‌دهد که ماشین به دلخواه خود را برای مدت معین با رعایت قوانین و مقررات مشخص شده، در اختیار داشته باشید و از آن لذت ببرید.
INFORMATION.text30: در سپریس، با همراهی کارشناسان ما، خودرو را مستقیم از مالک اجاره می‌کنید؛ به همین دلیل قیمت مناسب‌تر و شرایط آسان‌تری را تجربه خواهید کرد.

_500_PAGE.span: Sorry for the inconvenience. We are currently trying to fix the problem; please come back later.
_500_PAGE.p1: We will be glad to hear from you. You can call us at:

ABOUT_US_PAGE.p: We connect people around the world with their ideal rental car in Iran during their trip. There are hundreds of vehicles with different features, various additional options, and excellent insurance coverages among which you can find your desired rental car. We offer our services in partnership with local car owners in major cities of Iran. Best price and exceptional customer support are our priorities. We make sure every traveler is offered high-quality services to make their trip as easy and pleasant as possible. Concentrating on keeping our rates especially low and affordable, we try to help you plan a trip within your budget. We are more than happy to present unique services such as delivery at a location anywhere around the cities and rental cars with drivers. Sepris means horse racing field suggesting our services provide travelers with the comfort, confidence, and peace of mind to rent and ride all through the country.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.address: Unit 6, No. 8, Nakhoda Hemmati ALY, Sa’di St., Darya Blvd., Shahrak-e Gharb, Tehran

ADD_CAR_PAGE.formTitle: مشخصات خودرو را با مطابق با مدارک آن پر کنید.
ADD_CAR_PAGE.districtNote: سپریس فعلا فقط در تهران فعال است اما می‌توانید ثبت ماشین‌تان را کامل کنید. به محض اینکه در {value} فعال شویم با هماهنگی شما خودروتان را نمایش می‌دهیم.
ADD_CAR_PAGE.carLicenseNote: پلاک خودرو جهت جلوگیری از ثبت خودروی تکراری استفاده می‌شود و در نتایج جستجو نمایش داده نمی‌شود.
ADD_CAR_PAGE.text1: عکس‌های با کیفیت و در زوایای مختلف احتمال اجاره را بیشتر می‌کند، خودروهای بدون عکس شانس کمی برای گرفتن درخواست اجاره دارند.
ADD_CAR_PAGE.text2: لازم است عکس‌ها افقی باشد و تمام خودرو داخل کادر قرار گرفته باشد.
ADD_CAR_PAGE.text3: جهت بارگذاری تصاویر خودرو اینجا کلیک کنید یا آن را داخل این کادر بیندازید.

reviews.title: میزبان‌ها درباره سپریس چه می‌گویند؟
reviews.review1: وقتی تصمیم به اجاره خودروم گرفتم، از طریق جستجو در گوگل با سپریس آشنا شدم و بعد از دیدن سایت و تماس با پشتیبانی، اعتمادم جلب شد. بعدها هم هربار با پشتیبانی تماس گرفتم در دسترس بودن و هیچ مسئله‌ای رو از قلم نمی‌انداختن. با وجود این‌که ماشینم بیمه بدنه داره، بیمه اجاره خودرو سپریس رو مثل یک قانون در نظر گرفتم و درخواست مهمان‌هایی رو که بیمه خریداری کرده‌اند در اولویت می‌ذارم. تا حالا چند بار ماشینم رو از طریق اتولی اجاره دادم، چون خیالم راحته و قصد دارم باز هم به این کار ادامه بدم.
reviews.review2: زمانی که تصمیم گرفتم ماشینم رو اجاره بدم، چند تا از شرکت‌های سنتی و غیراستارت‌آپی اجاره خودرو در تهران رو بررسی کردم اما در نهایت شرکت شما رو انتخاب کردم، چون به نسبت همه، شرایط بهتری داشتید و این امکان رو فراهم کردین که مهمان بیمه اجاره خودرو خریداری کنه و همین‌طور ما (میزبان)، مهمان را مستقیم ببینیم و رودررو با هم صحبت کنیم و شرایط رو دقیق‌تر بررسی کنیم که بتونیم مهمان‌های بهتر و مسئولیت‌پذیرتری انتخاب کنیم. پشتیبانی هم همیشه در دسترس بوده و در همه مسائل به بهترین شکل به ما مشاوره داده و راهنمایی کرده.
reviews.review3: تا قبل از آشنایی با سپریس، ماشینم رو اجاره نداده بودم . اما در آلمان تجربه اجاره‌کردن خودرو را داشتم. اولش شناخت زیادی از سپریس نداشتم و بار اول اجاره دادن ماشین از نظرم ریسک بود. ولی از دفعات بعد با توجه به نحوه کار و پشتیبانی‌تون اعتمادم جلب شد. چون تا حالا تو هیچ شرکتی ندیدم که مثل شما واقعا “پشتیبان” داشته باشن. هروقت از شبانه‌روز که تماس گرفتم حضور داشتین و برای تصمیم‌گیری همراهم بودین. اوایل شرایطم برای اجاره دادن ماشین سخت‌گیرانه بود، ولی به خاطر همین حمایت و پشتیبانی شما منعطف‌تر شدم و سخت‌گیری‌های اولیه را ندارم.

SEPRIS_PAGE.text4: ثبت نام در سپریس ساده است، بعد از وارد کردن شماره تماس کد تایید ارسال شده را وارد کنید و اطلاعاتتان را تکمیل کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text6: در بخش جستجوی وب‌سایت، شهر و تاریخ موردنظرتان برای اجاره خودرو را تعیین کنید و از بین گزینه‌های پیشنهادی ماشین دلخواهتان را انتخاب کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text7: بیمه بخرید و ماشین اجاره‌ای را رزرو کنید
SEPRIS_PAGE.text8: در زمان ارسال درخواست رزرو می‌توانید برای خودرو پوشش بیمه خریداری کنید. خرید بیمه اختیاری است و در صورت بروز حادثه، بخشی از هزینه‌های خودرو را تامین خواهد کرد. در صورتی که پوشش بیمه انتخاب نکنید، تمام خسارت‌های احتمالی به عهده شما خواهد بود. بعد از انتخاب بیمه باید، درخواست رزرو دهید. صاحب خودرو بعد از بررسی، درخواست شما را قبول یا رد خواهد کرد.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text10: بعد از قبول درخواست رزرو از سمت میزبان، سپریس لینک پرداخت را برای شما ارسال خواهد کرد، از طریق آن و یا از طریق لینک موجود در صفحه سفارش‌ها مبلغ اجاره را پرداخت کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text13: ثبت نام در سپریس ساده است، بعد از وارد کردن شماره تماس کد تایید ارسال شده را وارد کنید و اطلاعاتتان را تکمیل کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text15: ابتدا با وارد کردن اطلاعات و بارگذاری تصاویر، ماشین یا ماشین‌های خود را در سپریس ثبت کنید. این کار در کمتر از چند دقیقه انجام خواهد شد. همچنین اطلاعات دقیق و عکس‌های خوب به اجاره سریع ماشین شما کمک خواهد کرد.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text17: درخواست‌های رزرو اجاره خودروی شما برایتان ارسال خواهد شد. شما می‌توانید بعد از بررسی فرم درخواست، آن را قبول یا رد کنید.می توانید سوالات یا ابهامات خود را در تماس با مهمان مطرح کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text20: بعد از واریز وجه منتظر تماس میزبان باشید تا هماهنگی‌های لازم مثل محل تحویل خودرو را با هم هماهنگ کنید و سوالات خود را درباره شرایط فنی، تمیزی و ... بپرسید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text22: بعد از قبول درخواست و انجام واریز وجه توسط مهمان، با او تماس بگیرید تا محل و زمان تحویل خودرو را هماهنگ کنید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text25: با صاحب ماشین در محل توافق شده دیدار کنید. ابتدا خودرو را به‌خوبی بررسی کنید و بعد از ارائه مدارک و امضای قرارداد، ماشین را تحویل بگیرید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text27: با مهمان ماشین در محل توافق شده دیدار کنید. باک بنزین، تمیزی خودرو و میزان کارکرد را بررسی کرده، قرارداد را امضا کنید و ماشین را تحویل دهید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text28: از ماشین خود کسب درآمد کنید
SEPRIS_PAGE.text29: در تمام این مدت می‌توانید استراحت کنید. خودرو شما برایتان درآمد خواهد داشت.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text32: در زمان پایان قرارداد، خودرو را با شرایطی که تحویل گرفته‌اید (حجم بنزین، تمیزی و ...) در محل تعیین شده به صاحبش بازگردانید و به میزبان امتیاز دهید.
SEPRIS_PAGE.text34: در زمان پایان قرارداد و در محل تعیین شده با مهمان ملاقات کنید. تمامی موارد مورد نیاز را در ماشین بررسی کنید، ماشین را تحویل بگیرید، در صفحه سفارش‌ها تحویل خودرو را تایید کنید و به مهمان امتیاز دهید.

PAYMENT_PAGE.successfullPurchase: Your payment has been completed successfully.
PAYMENT_PAGE.text1: The rental period starts from the time of delivery of the car, so it is necessary to return the car at the same time on the day of return. In case of delay, for this car delay cost is {value} and will be calculated per hour.
PAYMENT_PAGE.text2: The distance limit for this car is {value} km. An additional cost is {value} and will be calculated for each additional kilometer.
PAYMENT_PAGE.text3: A sample contract has been prepared for the parties by Sepris. The host prepares this contract in two copies on the day of delivery of the car and it is signed by both parties.

RENT_PAGE.banner: Sepris, Convenient Car Rental in Iran
RENT_PAGE.answer1: As a car rental service in Iran, Sepris has made it possible for you to rent the car directly from local car owners. By paying an insignificant amount of money, you can benefit from full car insurance (in partnership with Saman Insurance) for possible damages. Using our service, you can compare cars, prices, and conditions, choose the one with the best price and conditions for you, and rent it without having to submit numerous documents and unreasonable deposits.
RENT_PAGE.question2: شرایط اجاره خودرو از سپریس چیست؟
RENT_PAGE.answer2: چون در سِپریس خودرو را از مالک اجاره می‌کنید، قیمت‌ها اغلب پایین‌تر از سایز مراکز است. همین طور به دلیل همکاری نزدیک با بیمه، میزبان‌ها مدارک و ودیعه‌های کمتری از شما دریافت می‌کنند.

REQUEST_PAGE.shareYourReview: (با به اشتراک‌گذاری تجربه‌تان، به کاربران دیگر در انتخاب کمک می‌کنید.)
REQUEST_PAGE.noOrder: You had had no bookings recently.
REQUEST_PAGE.error1: You have already submitted a review for this car.

CAR_SETTING.title: شرایط شما برای اجاره
CAR_SETTING.delivery: I will deliver the car at guest's location
CAR_SETTING.rentCondition: با راننده اجاره می‌دهید یا بدون راننده؟
CAR_SETTING.note: اکثر درخواست‌ها برای اجاره ماشین بدون راننده است.
CAR_SETTING.discountNote: می‌توانید برای اجاره‌های با مدت بیشتر تخفیف تعیین کنید
CAR_SETTING.cancellationPolicies: شرایط و مدارک مورد نیاز برای اجاره خودروتان را بنویسید یا از موارد بالا انتخاب کنید.

assurance.text1: در سایت سپریس هر میزبان می‌تواند شرایط متفاوتی برای اجاره ماشینش بگذارد که بسته به نوع ماشین می‌تواند متفاوت باشد، به صورت کلی می‌توانید مدارک و ضمانت‌های زیر را برای اجاره خودروتان از مشتری بگیرید، اما این نکته را در نظر داشته باشید که مدارک و ضمانت‌های زیاد می‌تواند میزان درخواست‌های اجاره خودرو شما را کاهش بدهد.
assurance.text2: مدارک شناسایی معتبر مانند کارت ملی یا شناسنامه و در صورتی که اتباع خارجی یا گردشگر هستند پاسپورت.
assurance.text3: گواهینامه معتبر که حداقل ۶ ماه دارای اعتبار باشد.
assurance.text4: بیمه‌نامه اجاره خودرو (در زمان درخواست اجاره خودرو می‌تواند تهیه کند. توصیه می‌شود مشتریانی که این بیمه‌نامه را خریداری می‌کنند در اولویت قبول درخواست قرار دهید.)
assurance.text5: در نظر گرفتن شرایط سنی (پیشنهاد می‌شود که حداقل سن ۲۵ سال را در نظر بگیرید.)
assurance.text6: چک یا سفته به میزان مورد نیاز(معمولا به مبلغ ماشین گرفته می‌شود)
assurance.text7: ودیعه نقدی: با توجه به نوع ماشین می‌توانید مقداری پول نقد از مشتری بابت خسارت‌های احتمالی بگیرید.

CAR_SETTING.toast: خودروی {value} با موفقیت ثبت شد. ظرف روزهای آتی برای هماهنگی‌های بیشتر با شما تماس خواهیم گرفت.

search.title: Car Rental Search Result | Sepris

question_set.title: What does Sepris do?
question_set.content: Sepris, an online car rental platform, connecting the hosts (car owners) with the guests (car renters.) With Sepris, you can pick and hire out your ideal rental car among a list of available vehicles on any date you want.

question_set.title: In which cities do you offer rental cars? Where can I find them?
question_set.content: At the moment, you can only rent cars in Tehran and Karaj. In the future, other cities will be added to the system. You can see the list of cities in the search box on the homepage.

question_set.title: How is the car rental fee calculated on the Sepris website?
question_set.content: The cost of renting a car is presently specified by the host (car owner). The hosts can also see our recommended prices on the calculator page of the website.

question_set.title: Is the entire process for renting cars online?
question_set.content: Yes, the whole process is online, taking only a few minutes of your time.

question_set.title: There’s a problem with my user account. Should I sign up for a new one?
question_set.content: Call Sepris customer support and raise the problem. Our experts will provide you with the most appropriate solution.

question_set.title: Can Sepris suspend my user account?
question_set.content: If you do not comply with the terms and conditions or violate them, your user account may be suspended.

question_set.title: How can I sign up on Sepris?
question_set.content: First, enter your phone number in the sign-up section, then sign up on Sepris by entering the verification code sent to you.

question_set.title: Is it inevitably necessary to sign up for using Sepris?
question_set.content: If you merely want to browse and see the recommended cars, there is no need to sign up, but for submitting rental requests, you need to sign up first.

question_set.title: How do I browse the cars and see the rental fees?
question_set.content: Enter the name of the pick-up city as well as pick-up and drop-off dates for renting a car in the search box on the home page. After clicking on the search button, you can see the details for all the available cars.

question_set.title: How can I book a car on Sepris?
question_set.content: After selecting your pick-up city and dates, you will see the search result in which you can click on any car you want. You will then be directed to the car page where you can see all the details. After selecting your ideal rental car, click on the “Continue” button on the car page to re-check the rental details. Go through the terms and if you agree with them, click on “Submit”. Your request will be sent to the host and you will be notified of the result via SMS.

question_set.title: Are reservations made instantly or do they take long?
question_set.content: The host will look into your info after receiving your request; it may take either several minutes or hours depending on the time you submit the request. During business hours, this process takes two hours at most. Keep in mind that a complete profile helps the hosts in their decision and accelerates the process, therefore, increases the chance for your request to be accepted.

question_set.title: Can I increase the chance for my request being accepted?
question_set.content: The more complete a personal profile you have, and the more cars you have rented from Sepris, the better chance you got for getting confirmed. Besides, after each rental, the host rates you and writes a review about you and the experience they had. The higher your rating, the sooner will hosts accept your request in the future.

question_set.title: Is it possible for the host to decline my request?
question_set.content: Yes, a host may turn down your request in case they find your conditions and details not convincing enough for a rental.

question_set.title: What happens when my request is declined?
question_set.content: Seek counsel from Sepris customer support and try again for requesting and booking a car.

question_set.title: Can I insure the car I rent? What kind of insurance does Sepris offer?
question_set.content: Yes; you can insure the car. In collaboration with Saman Insurance, Sepris has designed a special package for you, the details of which you can see here. This insurance includes coverages for theft, crash and damages, fire, natural disasters, shattered windshields, paint, and chemical substances.

question_set.title: Is the sum displayed on the website the total cost or the daily rent?
question_set.content: The amount displayed on the search result page and the car page is the daily rent. You can see the total cost on the final bill.

question_set.title: How soon before the time I would be needing the car, can I rent it?
question_set.content: The reservation time for each car depends on its type and the conditions specified by the host. You need to search for the dates you will be needing the car and see the recommended cars.

question_set.title: What should I do after submitting the rental request?
question_set.content: If the host accepts your request, a payment link will be sent to you via SMS for paying the final fee. The host will call you to make arrangements for the time and place of pick-up after the payment had been done.

question_set.title: Can I rent a car for just one day?
question_set.content: Yes, many hosts rent out their cars for just one day, and you can find a list of them by searching your dates on the website.

question_set.title: What documents and guarantees do I need to present for renting a car?
question_set.content: Documents and guarantees vary with each vehicle. You can find this information under the rental terms specified on each car page.

question_set.title: To whom should I submit the documents and guarantees?
question_set.content: You should submit documents and guarantees to the host when signing the contract at pick-up and take them back when returning the car to the host. You should also pay one million tomans to Sepris for potential fines. A fines report will be taken from the traffic police in 15 business days and in case there is no fine, the sum will be returned to your account.

question_set.title: Do you provide counsel on vehicle selection?
question_set.content: Yes, you can call Sepris customer support to seek counsel and guidance.

question_set.title: Does the number of days impact the total sum of rent?
question_set.content: Yes, typically the host will assign certain discounts considering the number of days the car is rented; you can find them out when browsing.

question_set.title: What items should we check during the call with the host?
question_set.content: It is advisable to discuss some issues such as the required documents mentioned on the car page, contract clauses, the car’s technical condition and safety, car options and features, or the due process for potential problems such as a crash.

question_set.title: How do I pick up the car?
question_set.content: In the reservation stage, a detailed account of pick-up terms and conditions is specified. If the host offers delivery, the vehicle will be delivered to you at your location. Otherwise, you must go to the location specified by the host to pick up the car. These matters will be settled during the call with the host.

question_set.title: Can we use the rental car for trips?
question_set.content: Yes, there are no general restrictions for that; however, you must inform the host and Sepris customer support about your destinations upon submitting the request, in order to be mentioned in the contract.

question_set.title: What documents should I submit and to whom?
question_set.content: The full list of required documents and guarantees you should submit are specified on the car page; however, having a driver’s license and an identification card (passport) is compulsory.

question_set.title: What items should I look into when collecting the car?
question_set.content: Car specifications (model, color, condition, plate number, etc.) must be completely consistent with the details mentioned on the website. In case of any inconsistencies, call Sepris customer support.

question_set.title: Do we sign a contract when renting and picking up a car? Will I receive a copy?
question_set.content: Yes, two copies of the contract will be signed by you and the host at the pick-up, one of which will be handed to you.

question_set.title: Is it possible to rent a car for a month or a year?
question_set.content: Yes, some cars are available to be rented long-term. You can search for your date, find the available cars, and submit your request. The host will examine your request and the result will be sent to you via SMS. These long-term reservations include discounts as well.

question_set.title: What are the terms for cancellation?
question_set.content: Cancellation terms vary with each car and it is the host (car owner) that specifies them. You must read them carefully on the car page under “Rental and Cancellation Terms” when submitting a request.

question_set.title: How much should I pay as a cancellation fee?
question_set.content: The cancellation fee differs depending on the type of car and the time of cancellation; you can find this information under “Rental and Cancellation Terms” on the car page.

question_set.title: When will the money return to my account after cancellation?
question_set.content: We do our best to return the sum as soon as possible, though at times the payback might take up to two business days.

question_set.title: What are the terms for extending a rental and when should I inform?
question_set.content: You should call the host first to ask for an extension; if they agree, you must submit your request on Sepris website and after the host’s confirmation, you can make the payment and use the car for a longer period. If the host does not accept your request, you should return the car to the host at the previously scheduled time.

question_set.title: Can I change the date after booking the car? Under what circumstances is that possible?
question_set.content: Call Sepris’s customer support. We will examine your request and act upon it.

question_set.title: How many miles can a car go while rented?
question_set.content: The allowed mileage is specified by the host, mentioned under “Mileage and Excess Fees” on the car page.

question_set.title: Who is responsible to pay for the repairs in case of a car breakdown during the rental period?
question_set.content: The host is responsible for the cost of fundamental repairs but the cost of damages incurred by misusing the car must be paid by the renter; in case of a conflict upon these matters, counsel will be sought from an expert.

question_set.title: The host (car owner) called me and said that they cannot rent out the car and I should cancel my request. What should I do?
question_set.content: Under these circumstances, the host themselves should cancel the reservation. Note that if you do the cancellation, you must pay the cancellation fee. You should certainly inform Sepris customer support about this issue.

question_set.title: The host told me that they will not give the car to me and that I should definitely cancel. It’s been hours and no cancellation has been made. I want to book another car and I need the money. What should I do?
question_set.content: Call Sepris customer support so that our team makes the cancellation for you.

question_set.title: I have not damaged the vehicle but the owner claims that I’m at fault for the damages sustained.
question_set.content: To avoid these kinds of problems, you need to take photos of all exterior defects of the car upon pick-up, specify them on the checklist provided by Sepris, and sign. If you have purchased insurance for the rental, photos included in the insurance will be also valid documents to ascertain whether any damages have been incurred by you or not.

question_set.title: Am I liable to pay for the traffic tickets when driving the rental car?
question_set.content: You are in charge of paying the traffic fines for the period you have rented the car. The amount will be specified after 15 business days and will be taken out of your account; in case you have not been fined at all, the total sum will be returned to your account.

question_set.title: When will the deposit be given back to me?
question_set.content: The deposit will be paid back to you when you return the car; only one million tomans of it will remain in Sepris Company up to the next 15 days to cover the potential traffic fines.

question_set.title: Are all the cars equipped with GPS?
question_set.content: Yes, to prevent potential problems, each vehicle is equipped with a GPS that a host may check on special occasions and in case of problems.

question_set.title: How should I return the car?
question_set.content: Return the car in the same condition (same petrol volume, cleanliness, etc.) you collected it on the specified date, hour, and the place you had agreed upon with the host.

question_set.title: Can we rent a chauffeur-driven car?
question_set.content: Yes. You can see a list of chauffeur-driven cars on the website, specified with a tag. You can also filter the results accordingly on the search result page.

GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.h1: Sepris; Your Ideal Car Rental in Iran
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p1_1: We connect people around the world with their ideal rental car in Iran during their trip. At Sepris.com, you can search for all kinds of rental cars in Iran, compare prices, detailed information on additional facilities, and book the best option that fits your needs.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p1_2: We make sure you drive a car with peace of mind. We provide you with insurance that pays for everything in case of any damage or accident.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p1_3: We have provided an exceptional list of options for you to choose among. The rental cars available at Sepris are great in diversity; best prices, various body styles, options, features, and brands.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p1_4: We assure you get the help you may need at the right time. Our customer service team at Sepris is available 24/7 for any possible question, problem, or urgency.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.h2_3: Why Rent a Car in Iran?
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p2_1: No matter how long our trip is, it always seems short and we want to make the most out of the days. Renting a car in Iran would provide you with perfect opportunities and possibilities you wouldn’t otherwise imagine having. For that matter; a rental car in Iran gives you the freedom to explore the cities on your own and have a tour to places out of the common tourist traps and crowded cities. Moreover, you can rent a car in Tehran to get yourself out of the cost, delay, and hassle of public transport and online taxis. With taxis, you need to spend time requesting, calling, and organizing without having control over your schedule, changing your plan anytime, pulling over anywhere on the road to rest, to see the view, or for the toilet break, driving at the desired speed, etc. Having a rental car in Iran means you can have your own schedule regardless of the public transport and tour buses’ timetables. It may seem public transport is cheaper than car rental, but considering the convenience, the comfort, and the additional time you get, renting a car is incredibly cheap and cost-effective. Furthermore, having a taxi from the airport to the city usually costs a lot, having a rental from the onset of your trip helps you save money and time right from the start. We recommend renting a car in Tehran especially if you are traveling with family or in a group; that would be extremely cheaper than any other way of transportation.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p2_2: Also, not all trips are the same; you might travel for work or leisure, you might travel alone, with colleagues or family, you might be having a long road trip or just a small city tour. By using rental cars, you can pick the one that best fits your needs regarding comfort, space, gas consumption, etc. You can also choose to rent chauffeur-driven cars or self-drives. With chauffeur-driven rental cars, you will also have the benefit of a local guide’s companionship. Renting a car in Iran would bring you an extreme amount of comfort and convenience by having easy access to your stuff, making a great deal of space to stretch out, having control over the air conditioner, car windows, radio or player, etc. You will also have the privacy and peace that public transports would never offer you.
GUIDE_FOR_GUESTS_PAGE.p3_1: As a car rental service in Iran, Sepris has made it possible for you to rent the car directly from local car owners. By paying an insignificant amount of money, you can benefit from full car insurance (in partnership with Saman Insurance) for possible damages. Using our service, you can compare cars, prices, and conditions, choose the one with the best price and conditions for you, and rent it without having to submit numerous documents and unreasonable deposits.
